# react-animations

A CSS react-animations component that can be installed via this npm package. The package provides all of the
CSS you need to use the component.



## Installation

To install the package, from the command line, type:

```
npm install pui-css-react-animations
```

## Usage

Styles for supporting React Animations
You can find more examples of the react-animations component in the [pui style guide](http://styleguide.pivotal.io)
  
*****************************************

This is a component of Pivotal UI. It is a Pivotal specific implementation of Bootstrap.

[Styleguide](http://styleguide.pivotal.io)
